title: LOOKING FOR A OCEANIA PLAYER
body:
Looking for someone who is young (15-17) and looking for a good time on the Australian servers. We are looking for a mid laner who is consistent and will not feed their ass off. Or a jungler who is happy to play a tank and is always willing to help with ganks. Bonus points if you are funny and we are here to have fun.

We are looking for a player that can play on most Friday nights after 5pm AEST and sometimes every now and again on the weekends.

Better is able to talk with voice chat like Skype and not toxic.

replies.body:
i play all roles

main pref mid/adc , champs i use
mid - diana , ahiri. akali
adc - trist, mf, lucian
supp-braum,leona,lulu
top-fiora,irelia
jg-xin zhao,khazix,irelia,elise

stuck in b5 as i coudnt carry hard enough last season s3.

pros : great at making teamfights/plays
will communicate well with team
mechanics are great
level of champ understanding listed above high

cons: possibility of flaming and tiliting due to possible win conditions
sometimes get cocky when ahead
weak late game

ign: AfterEffect
jng main, play skarner, easy bloke to chill and wont feed

Add me on league. We can chat more there. 

Username - MockingLight
ayyeeeeee . I main lulu mid if ya wanna chuck me an invite?

Add me on league and we can organize something.
 Username - MockingLight
Im on OCE servers but i live in NZ i play Jungle tanks mainly Rek'sai have any voice chat :D

Sweet. Add me on league and we can organize something.
 
Username - MockingLight

Hey I'm not level 15-17 I am 30 and I am also looking for a team.
My strongest role is mid, and my 2nd is jungle which by chance is just what you need it seems
Let me know if you are interested

Sweet. Add me on league and we can organize something.
 
Username - MockingLight
